column4: ok so i have installed the nfs stuff, but all the documentation i can find only covers shareing folders on the linux side to the mac side .. i want to use the share i have set up on the mac on the ubuntu box
so how do i get a nfs share that is on the mac, mounted to a folder on the ubuntu PC ?
edit the exports for the mac server so that the ip address of the ubuntu machine is allowed access. Then, just use mount :)
